title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies: Group Inquiry-Based Science Gifted Education Utilizing Advanced Laboratory Equipment

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Acquire the ability to analyze data collected using ALE (Advanced Laboratory Equipment) through mathematical modeling
The group inquiry model enhances knowledge sharing and integration among team members, improving the efficiency of experimental design report writing by 40%.
Applying a distributed-integrated workflow process enables comparative evaluation of experimental results three or more times and derives synergistic effects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
